detaileddescription.para: Type of attributes
Type of attributes
Attribute definition structure.
my_atoi: This function converts a string to an integer.

parameterdescription.para: (in char *) The string to be converted.

simplesect.para: A negative value on error. Else, the converted integer.

detaileddescription.para: atomode: This function converts a string to a unix access mode.

parameterdescription.para: (in char *) The string to be converted.

simplesect.para: A negative value on error. Else, the access mode integer.

detaileddescription.para: convert time from "YYYYMMDDHHMMSS" to time_t.
split_path: splits a path 'dir/dir/dir/obj' in two strings : 'dir/dir/dir' and 'obj'.

parameterdescription.para: (in/out char *)
(out char **)
(out char **)

detaileddescription.para: clean_path: Transform a path to a cannonical path. Remove //, /./, /../, final / from a POSIX-like path.

parameterdescription.para: (in/out char*) The path to be transformed.
(in int) The max path length.

detaileddescription.para: concat: concatenates 2 strings with a limitation of the size of the destination string.

parameterdescription.para: (in/out char*) The destination string.
(in char*) The string to be added at the end of str1.
(in int) The max str1 length.

simplesect.para: NULL on error, the destination string, else.

detaileddescription.para: print_fsal_status: this function prints an fsal_status_t to a given output file.

parameterdescription.para: (in FILE *) The output where the status is to be printed.
(in status) The status to be printed.

detaileddescription.para: print_fsal_attrib_mask: Print an fsal_attrib_mask_t to a given output file.

parameterdescription.para: (in fsal_attrib_mask_t) The mask to be printed.
(in FILE *) The output where the mask is to be printed.

detaileddescription.para: strtype: convert an FSAL object type to a string.

parameterdescription.para: (in fsal_nodetype_t) The type to be printed.

simplesect.para: The name (char *) for this FSAL object type.

detaileddescription.para: print_fsal_attributes: print an fsal_attrib_list_t to a given output file.

parameterdescription.para: (in fsal_attrib_list_t) The attributes to be printed.
(in FILE *) The file where the attributes are to be printed.

detaileddescription.para: print_item_line: Prints a filesystem element on one line, like the Unix ls command.

parameterdescription.para: (in FILE*) The file where the item is to be printed.
(in fsal_attrib_list_t *) the attributes for the item.
(in char *) The name of the item to be printed.
(in char *) It the item is a symbolic link, this contains the link target.

detaileddescription.para: This structure contains FSAL settable attributes.

this function converts peers (attr_name=attr_value,attr_name=attr_value,...) to a fsal_attrib_list_t to be used in the FSAL_setattr call).
0 if no error occured, a non null value else.

briefdescription.para: Header file for functions used by several layers.
